name: Gravitational Paul
description:
Use the power of Paul's gravity gun to not only fall down but in every direction you fire in as you solve gravity-based puzzles!

Created for the 2018 Wolverine Soft Pumpkin Jam by:

  • Jason Debel
  • Sam Ronning
  • William Dong
  • Yuan Yao
  • Phunyawaj Niamtan
